<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to><![CDATA[if (table_name == 'sys_user_group')
    answer = true;]]></apply_to><basic_apply_to>sys_user_group</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sys_user</basic_query_from><insert_callback><![CDATA[addMTOM();

function addMTOM() {
  var user_id = current.sys_id;
  var group_id = parent.sys_id;
  var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
  gr.initialize();
  gr.group = group_id;
  gr.user = user_id;
  gr.insert();
}]]></insert_callback><name>Group Membership</name><query_from><![CDATA[answer = 'sys_user';]]></query_from><query_with><![CDATA[

current.addQuery('mtm.sys_user_grmember.group', parent.sys_id);]]></query_with><reference_field/><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-26 12:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>deb3f5a62fd430100f2658a72799b603</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Group Membership</sys_name><sys_package display_value="EC Demo" source="x_590393_ec_demo">976aaeb52fd030100f2658a72799b60c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="EC Demo">976aaeb52fd030100f2658a72799b60c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_deb3f5a62fd430100f2658a72799b603</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-26 12:38:02</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=deb3f5a62fd430100f2658a72799b603"/></record_update>
